rows.label: qev050103_MSG0001
rows.name: So you are the one sent by my master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0002
rows.name:
I will ask this directlyâ€”if I fight with the whole of my
ability, are you capable of withstanding that assault?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev050103_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gi Ziorde what he means by that.

rows.label: qev050103_JNK0020
rows.name: Promise

rows.label: qev050103_SEL0021
rows.name:
Assure Gi Ziorde that he can
come at you with full force.

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0003
rows.name:
You are the first human I have ever faced.
I do not wish to take your life by accident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0004
rows.name:
...But forgive me. If my master sent you,
I suppose such concerns are unwarranted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Heh. A foolish concern, I see.
I apologize for any offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Your unwavering gaze tells me all I need to know of
why my master chose you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0007
rows.name: Forgive the long preamble. I am Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0008
rows.name:
My master appears to consider Gi Ziordo and myself
to be equals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0009
rows.name:
But I am nothing like that muscleheaded brute.
His is a mindless violence, whereas I practice war
as the true art it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0010
rows.name:
To perceive the battlefield with a cool head before
cutting through with a swift blade is the warrior's way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0011
rows.name: I will prove that with my actions now. En garde![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0012
rows.name: I hear Gi Ziordo lost to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0013
rows.name:
He was a fool not to heed my warnings. I told him his
brute force approach would one day leave him open to
the blade of a more thoughtful opponent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0014
rows.name:
And what was your impression? Did Gi Ziordo put up
a fight fit to uphold the pride of the Wrothians?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050103_SEL0031
rows.name:
Say that you felt overpowered
by his large frame and blade.

rows.label: qev050103_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050103_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that it was an easy battle.

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0015
rows.name:
If a man who relies entirely on raw strength had your
back against the wall, I fear our master may have
overestimated you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0017
rows.name:
Agreed. A strong fool is still a fool just the same.
He does not understand how power should be used.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0018
rows.name: Forgive the long preamble. I am Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0019
rows.name:
My master appears to consider Gi Ziordo and myself
to be equals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0020
rows.name:
But I am nothing like that muscleheaded brute.
His is a mindless violence, whereas I practice war
as the true art it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0021
rows.name:
To perceive the battlefield with a cool head before
cutting through with a swift blade is the warrior's way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050103_MSG0022
rows.name: I will prove that with my actions now. En garde![ST:wait ]
